titleStmt.title: A proclamation for calling out heretors, &c., for His Majesties service
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Paterson, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Edinburgh, Printed by the Heir of Andrew Anderson ... And Reprinted at London by John Wallis ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given under Our Signet, at Edinburgh, the third day of October, 1688. And of Our Reign the fourth Year. Per Actum Dominorum Secreti Concilii. Will. Paterson, Cls. Sti. Concilii."
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library (London, England).
